articles.title: 'Absolutely gargantuan': astrophysicist explains largest cosmic explosion ever witnessed – video - The Guardian
articles.description: Scientists at Southampton University said they believe it was caused by a giant gas cloud getting pulled into a black hole
articles.content: Scientists at Southampton University say they accidentally stumbled upon the largest explosion ever recorded in the cosmos. Philip Wiseman, a lead researcher at the university, says his team believed… [+550 chars]

articles.title: Watch 2 Russian cosmonauts perform spacewalk on Friday - Space.com
articles.description: The roughly 7-hour EVA is scheduled to begin today (May 12) at 11:55 a.m. ET.
articles.content:
Two Russian cosmonauts will perform a spacewalk outside the International Space Station (ISS) today (May 12), and you can watch it live.
